mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CC_CM_AGMT_POLC_INFO ( /* ccCmAgmtPolcInfo.insertCcCmAgmtPolcInfo */ CM_AGMT_SEQ, SITE_NO, AGMT_POLC_CD, APLY_STR_DT, APLY_END_DT, CM_AGMT_POLC_GB_CD, TITLE, WRD_CONT, SYS_REG_ID, SYS_REG_DTM, SYS_MOD_ID, SYS_MOD_DTM ) VALUES ( NEXTVAL('CC_CM_AGMT_POLC_INFO_SQ01'), #{siteNo}, #{agmtPolcCd}, REPLACE(#{aplyStrDt}, '-', ''), REPLACE(#{aplyEndDt}, '-', ''), #{cmAgmtPolcGbCd}, #{title}, #{wrdCont}, #{sysRegId}, NOW(), #{sysModId}, NOW() )
